com.ibm.iotf.client.api

Class DeviceFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.iotf.client.api.DeviceFactory

  • public class DeviceFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to register, delete and retrieve information about devices
    This class can also be used to retrieve historian information

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DeviceFactory(java.util.Properties opt) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean deleteDevice(java.lang.String deviceType, java.lang.String deviceId)
      This method deletes the device which matches the device id and type of the organization
      Device getDevice(java.lang.String deviceType, java.lang.String deviceId)
      This method retrieves a device in the org whose authkey and token were passed previously
      Device[] getDevices()
      This method returns an array of all the devices belonging to the organization
      HistoricalEvent[] getHistoricalEvents(java.lang.String... deviceInfo)
      This method accepts variable number of arguments and returns a list of historical events
      If only one argument is passed, it contains the device type
      If 2 arguments are passed the 2nd argument represents deviceId
      Device registerDevice(java.lang.String deviceType, java.lang.String deviceId, java.lang.String metadata)
      This method registers a device

    • Method Detail

      • getDevice

        public Device getDevice(java.lang.String deviceType,
               java.lang.String deviceId)
        This method retrieves a device in the org whose authkey and token were passed previously
        Parameters:
        deviceType - an object of String which contains device type
        deviceId - an object of String which contains device id
        Returns:
        Device

      • getDevices

        public Device[] getDevices()
        This method returns an array of all the devices belonging to the organization
        Returns:
        devices An array of devices

      • getHistoricalEvents

        public HistoricalEvent[] getHistoricalEvents(java.lang.String... deviceInfo)
        This method accepts variable number of arguments and returns a list of historical events
        If only one argument is passed, it contains the device type
        If 2 arguments are passed the 2nd argument represents deviceId
        Parameters:
        deviceInfo -
        Returns:
        array of historical events

      • registerDevice

        public Device registerDevice(java.lang.String deviceType,
                    java.lang.String deviceId,
                    java.lang.String metadata)
        This method registers a device
        Parameters:
        deviceType - object of String representing device type
        deviceId - object of String representing device id
        metadata - object of String representing metadata. This value can be null
        Returns:
        device

      • deleteDevice

        public boolean deleteDevice(java.lang.String deviceType,
                   java.lang.String deviceId)
        This method deletes the device which matches the device id and type of the organization
        Parameters:
        deviceType - object of String which represents device Type
        deviceId - object of String which represents device id
        Returns:
        boolean to denote success or failure of operation
